comments:
N20070704-0010, was OK in 3.3

- new workspace
- add CVS connection to dev.eclipse.org:/cvsroot/eclipse
- open CVS Repositories view and select org.eclipse.core.expressions/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
- context menu > Show History

Probably due to the fix for bug 190434.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-07-04 18:04:35.156
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Fetching CVS revision history".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.filehistory.CVSFileHistory.refresh(CVSFileHistory.java:112)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.CVSHistoryPage$RefreshCVSFileHistory.run(CVSHistoryPage.java:1319)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

Created an attachment (id=73087)
Fix

You were right Markus, it is caused by the incompetent fix for bug 190434. My fault, I'm terribly sorry. I hope this patch will be a better one.
Wouldn't it be better to move the check to EclipseFile.getLogEntries(..) rather than polluting CVSFileHistory.refresh(..) with knowledge of the subtypes of ICVSFile?
With the latest patch, I get no NPE and no History! I don't think you have the logic right in EclipseFile (i.e. I think you may want to negate the isAccessible check).

Created an attachment (id=73183)
Fix v3

You're absolutely right Michael. I wanted to answer Markus immediately and in consequence I didn't check the if clause as I should. I'm terribly sorry.

Created an attachment (id=73333)
Fix v3 tidied up

I've tidied up the patch a bit and released it to HEAD. I will release it to 3.3.1 shortly.
